article_title: Cross helps Moriah pull off second upset to win D title

article_metadata.news_keywords: sports, high_school_sports, local_sports, sportsstats, high_school, northern_basketball_league, girls_basketball, keene_central_school, moriah_central_school
article_metadata.author: BY JOHN GREEN Press-Republican

og.description: A 6-0 run sparked the Moriah girls' basketball team in its 45-40 win over Keene in the Section VII Class D final Friday.
og.title: Cross helps Moriah pull off second upset to win D title
